info.title: Medusa Storefront API
info.description: API reference for Medusa's Storefront endpoints. All endpoints are prefixed with `/store`.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Auth endpoints that allow authorization of customers and manages their sessions.

tags.name: Cart
tags.description: Cart endpoints that allow handling carts in Medusa.

tags.name: Collection
tags.description: Collection endpoints that allow handling collections in Medusa.

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: Customer endpoints that allow handling customers in Medusa.

tags.name: Gift Card
tags.description: Gift Card endpoints that allow handling gift cards in Medusa.

tags.name: Order
tags.description: Order endpoints that allow handling orders in Medusa.

tags.name: Product
tags.description: Product endpoints that allow handling products in Medusa.

tags.name: Product Variant
tags.description: Product Variant endpoints that allow handling product variants in Medusa.

tags.name: Region
tags.description: Region endpoints that allow handling regions in Medusa.

tags.name: Return Reason
tags.description: Return Reason endpoints that allow handling return reasons in Medusa.

tags.name: Return
tags.description: Return endpoints that allow handling returns in Medusa.

tags.name: Shipping Option
tags.description: Shipping Option endpoints that allow handling shipping options in Medusa.

tags.name: Swap
tags.description: Swap endpoints that allow handling swaps in Medusa.
